properties.body:
MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
1. NATO EXERCISE BRILLIANT MARINER 2013 (BRMR / MA 13)
   23 SEP THRU 06 OCT. NUMEROUS MILITARY UNITS WILL
   OPERATE IN AREA BOUND BY
   40-39N 018-00E, 40-39N 018-46E,
   37-40N 018-46E, 36-22N 015-30E,
   36-22N 011-30E, 38-00N 010-00E,
   38-00N 007-30E, 41-20N 007-30E,
   41-20N 013-00E.
2. NATO FORCES REGULARLY EXERCISE TO SECURE INNOCENT PASSAGE
   OF MERCHANT SHIPPING. MERCHANT VESSELS WITHIN OR
   TRANSITING THESE AREAS ARE INVITED TO PARTICIPATE
   ON A NO-COST / NO DELAY BASIS. ANY VESSEL WISHING
   TO ASSIST BY PROVIDING BOARDING AND/OR CLOSE ESCORTING
   OPPORTUNITIES IS REQUESTED TO CONTACT
   THE NATO SHIPPING CENTRE (NSC) AT LEAST 24 HOURS
   IN ADVANCE OF ARRIVAL IN THE EXERCISE AREAS,
   E-MAIL: INFO@SHIPPING.NATO.INT,
   PHONE: 44 19 2395 6574, FAX: 44 19 2395 6575.
3. VESSELS ARE REQUESTED TO PROVIDE THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION:
   A. VESSEL NAME.
   B. IMO NUMBER.
   C. MMSI AND E-MAIL CONTACT DETAILS.
   D. PREFERRED METHOD OF CONTACT
      (EX. PHONE, E-MAIL OR INMARSAT).
   E. DTG (UTC) / POSITION / SPEED / COURSE.
   F. NEXT PORT OF CALL / ETA.
4. VESSELS WITHIN OR APPROACHING THE EXERCISE AREAS MAY
   BE CONTACTED BY NAVAL UNITS AND BY THE
   BOARDING COORDINATOR (BC) AT NATO HQ.
5. CANCEL THIS MSG 07 OCT 13.
